altTitles.ja: 私のアリカ

altTitles.en: My Arika

description.en: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
description.ja: 人気急上昇中のアイドルグループのセンター・アリカの身に起きた大事件。犯人はファンか、それとも‥‥。華々しいアイドル業界の光と闇が今暴かれる！
description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

altTitles.ja: 少年のアビス

altTitles.en: World End Boy Meets Girl

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

altTitles.ja: あせとせっけん

description.en:
Asako’s living her dream, working at the toiletry maker Lilia Drop. Little do her coworkers know, the reason she loves the company so much is that she’s ashamed of her body odor, and their soap is the only thing that does the trick. So when the company’s lead product developer, a perfuming genius, approaches her in the lobby and wonders what “that smell” is, she’s terrified … but could it be … that he likes it? And, even more surprising to Yae … does she like him?

TV Dorama adaptation: [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718871-ase-to-sekken)
description.ja:
女性に絶大な人気を誇る化粧品＆バス用品メーカー・リリアドロップに勤めるOL・八重島麻子（やえしまあさこ）は、重度の汗っかきなのがコンプレックス。

デオドラント製品が手放せない生活の中、ある日、商品開発部の名取香太郎（なとりこうたろう）に、「君の体臭は素晴らしい！ 新商品の石鹸開発のため、これから毎日、君のにおいを嗅ぎに来ます！」と言われてしまう。

でも、においを嗅がれるのは、そんなに嫌でもなくて……？

多汗女子と嗅覚男子の、超純愛フェチラブコメ、爆誕!!
description.uk: Асако Яешіма — боязка офісна працівниця фірми туалетних товарів Lilia Drop. Асако любить компанію, тому що вона соромиться своїх проблем із потовиділенням і запахом тіла, а запах мила, виробленого компанією, — єдине, що здатне зняти її невпевненість. Однак, коли Котаро Наторі, провідний розробник продукту компанії, підходить до неї та відчуває її аромат, він заявляє, що любить запах Асако і вважає його надихаючим. Оскільки вони продовжують зустрічатися по роботі, Асако починає менше піклуватися про те, що її обнюхує Котаро, і вони починають романтичні стосунки.
description.pt-br: Em um romance de escritório, há uma linha tênue entre sexy e estranho… e essa linha é onde Asako – uma mulher que transpira copiosamente – conheceu Koutarou – um desenvolvedor de perfume que não se cansa do perfume da Asako. Asako está vivendo seu sonho, trabalhando na fabricante de produtos de higiene pessoal Lilia Drop. Mal sabem seus colegas de trabalho, o motivo pelo qual ela ama tanto a empresa é que ela tem vergonha de seu odor corporal, e o sabonete deles é a única coisa que resolve. Então, quando o principal desenvolvedor de produtos da empresa, um gênio da perfumaria, se aproxima dela no saguão e se pergunta o que é “aquele cheiro”, ela fica apavorada… Mas será que… ele gostou?

altTitles.vi: Quản Gia Nam Phụ Của Tiểu Thư Xuyên Không

altTitles.th: ภารกิจพิทักษ์พ่อบ้านสุดหล่อ

altTitles.ja: お嬢さんの執事

description.en: Harboring an obsession with the second male lead of the novel series *The Flower Holds a Sword*. Like always I write a commend about Lancelot and went to sleep. But something is off?! When I woke up my *favorite character* called me "milady" and brightly smiled at me! I think I won the lottery. Or I saved earth in my previous life. If you do good stuff in your past life you'll have good luck in your next life. If it's not that how could this even happen? This lottery that I won, I should use it properly. I decided I'll make my *favorite character*'s happiness my number one priority.

altTitles.ja: グッド・ドクター

altTitles.en: The Good Doctor

description.en:
The main character, Park Si-on, suffers from autism and savant syndrome.
With his innate genius like two sides of the same coin, he enters a pediatric surgery resident at a university hospital.
The prejudice of being a doctor with autism and the battle for power in the hospital are getting more and more dangerous...!
Will I ever be able to become a real doctor?

---

- Based on 2013 K-drama of the same name
description.ko:
몸은 29살, 마음은 9살. 자폐증과 서번트 증후군을 앓고 있는 주인공 박시온.
동전의 양면처럼 타고난 천재성을 가지고 대학병원 소아외과 레지던트로 들어가게 된다.
자폐증을 앓는 의사라는 편견과 병원 안에서 벌어지는 세력 싸움 속에서 점점 위태로워지는데..!
과연 진짜 의사가 될 수 있을까?

altTitles.en: Dragon's Cinema

altTitles.ja: 竜の映画館

description.en:
In a little mysterious world where dragon people that sometimes transform into dragons live together with humans, a boy's childhood dragon girl friend is supposed to move to the dragon's city when she turns 17... This is a heartwarming love story between a dragon and a human!

This is the result of a contest where people could make manga storyboards with a special Jump app, with the winners getting their idea professionally illustrated.

title.en: The Demon King Who Lost His Job

altTitles.en: Jobless Demon King
The Laid Off Demon King

altTitles.pt-br: O rei demônio que perdeu o emprego

description.en: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.
description.pt-br: Ele é o Rei Demônio que sofreu impeachment. Ela é a corajosa heroína que foi demitida por causa de uma expedição fracassada. Presos pelo destino, os dois embarcam em uma aventura para pagar suas dívidas.

altTitles.ja: 葬られたきみへ

description.en:
In ten or so years, the moon will collide with the Earth, brining with it the end.
Before the apocalypse happens, Nekuro confesses to her best friend Kiri. Kiri, seeing no hope for the future, takes her confession half-joklingly until one day, when Nekuro dies.

altTitles.ja: らんま1/2

altTitles.th: รันม่า ½ ไอ้หนุ่มกังฟู

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Soun was disappointed to find that Ranma was a girl. However, when Ranma got out of the bath, he turned into a boy and the panda turned into Ranma's father, Genma. The two had fallen into a fountain during their training in China, a fountain that turned them into a woman and panda respectively when they touched the water. 

The Tendo family is initially in turmoil, including Akane, who has become a prospective bride, as they face the troublesome duo who go back and forth between man and woman, human and panda, although they can be restored to their original state if they are bathed in hot water. 

This is the first volume of a new edition of the popular manga.


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/ranma-1-2)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.pt-br: Ranma Saotome foi treinado desde a infância até aos 16 anos. É estudante de artes marciais que, junto ao pai, Genma Saotome, fez uma jornada de treinamento nas Montanhas Bayan Har Shan, na Província de Qinghai, na China. Ali há o campo de treinamento chamado Jusenkyo onde existem diversas fontes amaldiçoadas. Cada uma delas está associada à história de alguém que morreu afogado há centenas ou milhares de anos e quem cair em uma delas transforma-se no ser que morreu afogado nela, seja ele humano ou não.  No meio do treinamento, Ranma e seu pai caem, cada um em uma fonte diferente, e acabam amaldiçoados. Depois desse incidente, toda vez que Ranma se molha com água fria, transforma-se em uma bela garota, enquanto seu pai em um enorme panda. Somente o banho com água quente pode reverter os personagens à sua forma original, ainda que temporariamente.

altTitles.ja: 押しかけ女房、コドモ付き!

altTitles.en: Uninvited Wife, With Child!

description.en: High school girl Kousaka Kako's life is turned upside down when two uninvited guests show up on her doorstep; Mirai, a self-proclaimed girl from the future, and Nozomi, who is supposedly Mirai and Kako's child.

altTitles.ja: お狐ギャルの片喰さん

description.en:
A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun. Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is... a fox spirit!?

---
**Alternative Raw:** [Nico Nico Seiga](https://sp.seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)
description.ja:
幼馴染みは…化け狐！？

ごく普通の真面目な男子高校生、賀茂（かも）くん。勉強に励む日々だったが、悩みは幼馴染みの片喰（かたばみ）さんが毎日勉強の邪魔をしてくること。しかも片喰さんの正体は……化け狐だった！？

title.en: Conquering the Academy with Just a Sashimi Knife.

altTitles.en: I Took Over the Academy With a Single Sashimi Knife
Chewed Up the Academy With a Bag of Sashimi
Chew the Academy With a Sashimi Stick

description.en:
"If I slash, it will be cut."

I, who was once called the best swordsman in the nation, have ended up in a mobile game I've only spent money on a few times. And I’ve even received the blessing of the 'Sword God'!

But… the only weapon I can use is a sashimi knife?

Just one minute a day. I become a Sword Saint with a sashimi knife.

title.en: Dungeon Busters ~Chuunen Otoko desu ga Niwa ni Dungeon ga Shutsugen shita node Sekai wo Sukuimasu~

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン・バスターズ　～中年男ですが庭にダンジョンが出現したので世界を救います～

altTitles.en: Dungeon Busters: I Am Just Middle-Aged Man, But I Save the World Because the Dungeon Appeared in My Home Garden.

altTitles.id: Dungeon Busters: Aku Hanya Pria Paruh Baya, Tapi Aku Menyelamatkan Dunia Karena Dungeon Muncul di Kebun Rumahku.

description.en:
Clear all the dungeons! There are 666 of them and 10 years to do it. If not, the only thing that awaits...is total annihilation. Ezoe Kazuhiko suddenly finds a mysterious underground space in his yard. When he steps into what turns out to be the very first dungeon in this world, he ends up activating the Dungeon System and learns from the mysterious beauty who appears to him, Akane, that the world is doomed to destruction if the 666 total dungeons that will be appearing in this world are not all cleared within 10 years. As countries begin taking measures in response to the dungeons appearing all over the world, Ezoe seeks out companions together with whom he establishes Dungeon Busters Inc., a company dedicated to clearing all the dungeons in the world! The curtains rise on this dungeon-delving epic with overwhelming realism!


* [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3255fp/)  (jp)
* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/dungeon-busters)
description.id: Selesaikan semua dungeon!  Ada 666 dari mereka dan 10 tahun untuk melakukannya.  Jika tidak, satu-satunya hal yang menunggu...adalah pemusnahan total.  Ezoe Kazuhiko tiba-tiba menemukan dungeon misterius di halaman rumahnya. Ketika dia melangkah ke dalam untuk melihat apa yang terjadi, ternyata itu adalah dungeon pertama di dunia ini, dan pada akhirnya secara tidak sengaja dia mengaktifkan Sistem
description.ja:
江副和彦は、経営コンサルタントを生業とし独身を謳歌していた。
だが突如、彼の自宅の庭にダンジョン――『深淵』が出現し一変！興味本位で足を踏み入れたことで「ダンジョン・システム」が起動し、江副の下僕を名乗る謎のくノ一・朱音まで現れ、衝撃の事実を告げる。

「今後、世界中に全666のダンジョンが出現し、　10年以内に全てを攻略できなければ……『魔物大氾濫』により人類は滅亡します」

さらに、その事実を知るのはシステムを起動した江副ただ一人。図らずも招いてしまった世界の危機を救うため、彼がまず始めたのはダンジョンの検証と改良――"ダンジョンＤＩＹ"で……。

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.
Midnight Heart Tune

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

title.en: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

altTitles.en: The War of Greedy Witches

description.en: Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches.” With the addition of the final witch, Joan of Arc, Walpurgis Night begins: Only one witch can survive, and have her wish granted!
description.ja: フランスを救った奇跡の英雄ジャンヌ・ダルク。火刑に処され、その生涯を終えようとしていた彼女は死の間際、別世界へと飛ばされてしまう。そこにいたのはその名を歴史に刻み、「魔女」と呼ばれる32人の女傑たちであった。そして、最後の「魔女」ジャンヌダルクが揃い、欲深き魔女たちの殺し合い魔女千夜血戦の開幕が告げられるーー!!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！アンソロジーコミック

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Anthology Comic

Bocchi the Rock! anthology by various mangaka.

---

title.en: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All

altTitles.ja: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Ki ni Natteru Hito ga Otoko Janakatta

altTitles.fr: Le garçon qui l'intéressait n'en était en fait pas un

altTitles.pt-br: O cara de que estou a fim não era um cara?!

altTitles.uk: Хлопець, який її цікавив, взагалі не був хлопцем

altTitles.ru: Парень, которым она увлечена, на самом деле не парень

altTitles.az: Onun maraqlandığı oğlan əslində heç oğlan deyilmiş

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zàiyì de rén bùshì yìxìng

altTitles.id: Pria Yang Dia Suka Ternyata Sama Sekali Bukan Pria

altTitles.th: คนที่เธอปิ๊งความจริงไม่ใช่ผู้ชาย

altTitles.ja-ro: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

title.en: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi

altTitles.ja: これからだんだん幸せになっていく怖い 女上司

altTitles.ar: رئيسة مرعبة تزداد سعادة وسعادة من الآن فصاعدًا

altTitles.ja-ro: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Korekara Dondon Shiawase ni Natte iku Kowai Jōshi

altTitles.en: A Scary Boss, But From Now on She's Going to Be Happier and Happier

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.ar: مديرتي مخيفة للغايه، لكن من الأن وصاعدًا سأبذل قصارى جهدي لجعلها الأسعد.
description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

title.en: The Strongest Magical Swordsman Ever Reborn as an F-Rank Adventurer

altTitles.ja: 史上最強の魔法剣士、Fランク冒険者に転生する タテマンガ版

altTitles.ja-ro: Shijou Saikyou no Mahou Kenshi, F Rank Boukensha ni Tensei Suru

description.en:
Yuri was the hero who saved the world, being called “Demon Emperor” in his first reincarnation and “Sword Saint” in his second reincarnation. However, before he knew it, he was considered a “monster” and was shunned by people. Yuri finally gets fed up and decides to live 100% for himself next time.

He reincarnates into the future and is immediately attacked by monsters. As he defends himself, Yuri acquires the skills of his previous lives and quickly annihilates his enemies. Eventually, Yuri arrives at the adventurers guild and decides to start his life as an F-rank novice adventurer while hiding his true strength.

A different world fantasy of a man who has mastered both magic and swordsmanship begins!!

altTitles.ja: 10000光年双眼鏡

description.en: Within a certain galaxy in a certain universe, within a certain planet in a certain galaxy, a girl is alone on her birthday.
description.fr: Dans une certaine galaxie, dans un certain univers, sur une certaine planète, une fille est seule le jour de son anniversaire.
description.ru: В определенной галактике, в определенной вселенной, на определенной планете в определенной галактике девушка одинока в свой день рождения.
description.vi: Vượt thời gian và không gian, dù cách mấy ngàn dặm trùng dương vũ trụ ngân hà, những người có tình vẫn sẽ tìm thấy nhau.

altTitles.ja: 烏は主を選ばない

altTitles.en: The Raven Does Not Choose Its Master

description.en:
Yamauchi - a fantastic world where the Yatagarasu, a race of three-legged crows with the ability to transform into humans, live. Yukiya, a young Yatagarasu, is appointed as the personal attendant of the eccentric Crown Prince Wakamiya. Soon, he is entangled in a web of conspiracies attempting to overthrow the heir to the Imperial throne. 

An adaptation of the second book of the award-winning <Yatagarasu> novel series by Chisato Abe. The first book has been licensed in English as [A Raven for All Seasons](https://mangadex.org/title/c22db5fc-726a-41ad-8402-5537e7de2277/karasu-ni-hitoe-wa-niawanai) by [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10162/episode/336576).
description.ja:
シリーズ累計150万部超！ 大人気小説「八咫烏（やたがらす）シリーズ」比翼の漫画化！
「山内（やまうち）」と呼ばれる異世界で、人の姿に転身できる「八咫烏」達が織りなす物語。日嗣の御子の座についた若宮に一年の期限付きで仕えることになった少年、雪哉。だが若宮は「うつけ」と呼ばれるとんでもない人で…。圧倒的スケールの世界観と緻密な筆致でおくる異世界ファンタジー！

title.en: The Secret of the Partner Next to You

altTitles.en: Jae-Kyung's Secret
The Secret of Jae-Kyung

description.en: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?
description.ko:
평범한 남자 고등학생 양기룡.
그리고 언제나 헤실헤실하고 가끔 나사빠진 행동을 하는
그의 짝꿍 유재경.
그럭저럭 귀엽다고 생각되는 반 친구였을 뿐인데..
어느 날 우연히 그녀의 위험한 비밀을 알게 된다.
이 심장의 두근거림은 두려움인지, 설렘인지..?
description.es-la: Yang Kiryong es un chico de preparatoria común y corriente, que tiene una compañera de clase llamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, la cual es algo torpe y despistada. Ambos tienen una muy buena amistad, pero sin ningún tipo de atracción amorosa. Hasta que un día, por casualidad, Kiryong descubrió el secreto más profundo de su amiga y debido a esto su corazón empezó a latir, ¿serán latidos de miedo o amor?
description.pt-br: Yang Kiryong é um garoto comum do ensino médio que tem uma colega de classe chamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, que é um pouco desajeitada e sem noção. Ambos têm uma amizade muito boa, mas sem nenhum tipo de atração amorosa. Até que um dia, por acaso, Kiryong descobriu o segredo mais profundo de sua amiga. Por causa disso seu coração começou a bater, será de medo ou de amor?

description.en:
I am a hungry Vampire. I longed to suck the blood of my destined one, which is said to be the finest, but somehow I satisfied my hunger on social media as an internet influencer. But one day, I got a hateful comment--.

Based on the song Vampire by DECO*27
description.ja:
私は飢えたヴァンパイア。
極上といわれる運命の人の血を吸うことに憧れ、ひょんなことからインフルエンサーとしてSNSで飢餓感を満たしていた。
しかしあるときアンチコメントがきて――。

再生数5000万回超!!人気ボカロP・DECO*27の中毒必至ヒット曲をコミカライズ！

altTitles.en: Seoul Station’s Necromancer

altTitles.es: NIGROMANTE DE LA ESTACIÓN DE SEÚL

description.en:
[You have entered the dungeon at Gwachun Station’s 1st Exit.]

After years of fighting for survival on planet Alphen, Kang Woojin had become a fearsome necromancer and ruler of his own territory. But now that he’s finally found a way back to Earth, he’s nothing more than a low-level player clearing dungeons for cash. Soon enough, though, Woojin’s undeniable skills have major guilds vying for his attention. And just in time, because with Woojin’s old enemy threatening invasion, those skills might be the only thing standing between humanity and destruction!
description.ko: 20년 전. 알 수 없는 이유로 아르펜 행성으로 소환된 '강우진'. 미약한 그는 잔학한 몬스터들 틈에서 살아남았고, 마침내 '만렙의 네크로맨서'로 성장했다. 그의 등장으로 아르펜의 모든 살아있는 존재들은 공포에 떨었고, 죽은 자들은 그에게 경배했다. 분수를 모르고 그에게 칼을 겨눈 자들은 싸늘한 주검이 되어 그 피로 대지를 적셨다. 그리고 아르펜으로 소환된 지 20년째 되던 날, 그토록 돌아가고 싶었던 지구로 향하는 포탈이 열린다! 그런데.. [과천역 1번 출구 던전에 입장하셨습니다.] "뭐지? 어째서 지하철역에서 몬스터가..? 왜 또 시간은 5년밖에 안 지난 거야?" 의문이 채 해결되기도 전에 서서히 지구를 옥죄어 오는 거대한 적. 트라넷과 그의 수하들. "이 X끼들. 아주 뒤지려고 여길 쳐들어와?" 절체절명의 지구, '만렙의 네크로맨서'의 분노가 세상을 구한다!
description.ru:
[Вы вошли в подземелье через первый вход на станции Квачхон]
Бывший ученик средней школы Кан У Джин обнаруживает, что после насильного призыва на чужую планету на 20 лет, он возвращается на Землю, которая уже отличается от родного дома из его воспоминаний.

Наблюдайте за становлением Кан У Джина, сильнейшего Некроманта Земли!

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daiyonshou - Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majou

altTitles.es: Re:Zero - Empezar de cero en un mundo diferente - Arco 4: El santuario y la bruja de la avaricia

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 4: The Sanctuary and the Witch of Greed

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活 第四章 聖域と強欲の魔女

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть четвёртая: Святилище и ведьма жадности

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero - Capítulo 4: O Santuário e a Bruxa da Ganância

description.en: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
description.es:
Decididos a liberar a Rem de un misterioso letargo, Subaru y Emilia emprenden un nuevo viaje hacia el Santuario en donde se enfrentarán a nuevos peligros que jamás imaginarían.

¡La esperada adaptación del arco 4 comienza aquí!
description.ru: После победы над белым китом и архиепископом греха лени Петельгейзе, Субару наконец воссоединяется с Эмилией. Однако они узнают шокирующие новости, что на Круш с Рем по пути в столицу снова напал культ ведьмы. Круш потеряла свою память, а все воспоминания о Рем у людей были стёрты. Вместе с жителями деревни Субару решает вернуться обратно, однако деревня оказалась пустой. Оставшиеся жители, которые под руководством Рам отправились в так называемое "Святилище", до сих пор не вернулись. Что же там произошло?..

title.en: My Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.en: The Second Life Is a Healing Life?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha segunda vida é uma vida de cura?
Minha segunda vida é uma vida de curandeiro?

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

title.en: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko

altTitles.ja: 小春と湊 わたしのパートナーは女の子

altTitles.en: Koharu and Minato: My Partner is a Girl
Happy Life with my Girlfriend

altTitles.th: โคฮารุกับมินาโตะ -แฟนของฉันเป็นผู้หญิง-

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

altTitles.pt: As Três Fadas Orientais - Sagrado Local Oriental

altTitles.en: Touhou Sangetsusei: Oriental Sacred Place

altTitles.ja: 東方三月精 - Oriental Sacred Place

description.en:
The third part in the official long-running series about the daily shenanigans of Gensokyo's biggest pranksters, the Three Fairies of Light.  
  
2005: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Eastern and Little Nature Deity.  
2006: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.  
2009: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Oriental Sacred Place.  
2016: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Visionary Fairies in Shrine.  
  
**Português:**  
Continuação do Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.

altTitles.ja: 加治隆介の議

description.en:
Kaji Ryusuke is a second son of a great politician. However, his father and brother both pass away from a car accident. Now, those who supported Ryusuke's father want Ryusuke to carry on the family business as a politician. At first, Ryusuke tries to get out of the responsibility, but he eventually enters an election to become a politician.  
The manga chronicles Ryusuke's rise in the world of Japanese politics.

title.en: The Cursed Strongest Player Rules the World

altTitles.ja: 呪われた最強プレイヤーは今世も無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Norowareta Saikyou Player wa Konse mo Musousuru

description.en:
In the popular VR Net game Deep Space Frontier, set in a world where humans, angels, demons, and beastmen exist together, the world is engulfed in chaos due to the threat of the powerful Demon King, Sada. 

Among the tens of millions of players, heavy user Zen Ichinose is the only one to successfully defeat him! However, his victory is short-lived as he is engulfed by light emanating from his monitor and drawn into the game world. 

Furthermore, his appearance is that of the Demon King Sada himself, whom he had just defeated…?!

altTitles.ja: 逃げろ松本

description.en: Formerly a three time back-to-back winner of the All-Japan Intercollegiate Road Cycling Championships, Mastumoto now spends his days doing bike deliveries to pay the bills. Just as he contemplates giving up cycling for the sake of his future, Matsumoto suddenly finds himself at the center of an unbelievable incident...! Make way for this hard-hitting high-speed action!!

altTitles.ja: ヤンキー娘
帰ってください！ 阿久津さん

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

description.en:
Ooyama-kun normally doesn’t get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place!

Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san’s sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space… he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn’t?

A teasing comedy under a single roof!
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja:
**俺の部屋がヤンキー娘のたまり場に!? ヤンキー×非リア充のからかいコメディ！**

普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!? 一つ屋根の下のからかいショートコメディ！

---

**Ore no heya ga yankī musume no tamariba ni!? Yankī × hi riajū no karakai komedi!**

Fudan wa mattaku kakawari no nai kurasu no furyō joshi Akutsu-san ni nazeka ie o tamariba ni sa rete shimatta hitorigurashi no Ōyama-kun. Gara no warui Akutsu-san ni nanika hidoi koto o sa reru node wa to oidasou to suru nodaga, mubōbi de kyori-kan no chikai kanojo no erokawaī shigusa ni dogimagi shite shimai…? Kaette hoshī no ni, kaette hoshikunai! ? Hitotsu yane no shita no karakai shōtokomedi!
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

altTitles.ja: ファントム イン ザ トワイライト

description.en:
Vlad, Luke, and Tauryu work in Café Forbidden, a mysterious coffee shop that only opens at night.   
  
The three men look pretty normal, but they hide a secret they cannot share with anyone: every evening, they rush around London to uncover the mysterious incidents that take place in the city.

altTitles.en: Second Marriage of the Empress
The Remarried Empress

description.en:
Navier was the perfect Empress and a masterful administrator and regent for the empire; however, she and the Emperor were not lovers, and the Emperor wanted a wife, not a colleague. And so, he sought a concubine and placed a secretly ambitious slave girl beside him. That was fine, as she was willing to allow him his concubine of choice… until Navier heard the Emperor promised the slave girl the Empress' position. After much agonizing, Navier decided to marry the king of the neighboring kingdom.  
  
A popular web novel adapted to webtoon.  


---
description.ru: Навье была идеальной императрицей, однако императору нужна была жена, а не коллега. И вот император оставил императрицу Навье и взял в наложницы рабыню Рашту. Всё было прекрасно, пока Навье не услышала, как император пообещал рабыне место императрицы. После долгих мучений Навье решила, что она снова выйдет замуж.

altTitles.ja: めぐる未来

altTitles.en: Revolving Future

description.en:
Mirai, a man who does not show his emotions, lives happily with his innocent and cheerful wife Meguru, but he has a "cursed disease" that he keeps secret even from his wife.
Then one day, Mirai receives an important call from the police concerning his wife...!

altTitles.en: Dangerous Lovers

description.en:
I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.

altTitles.ja: Rabu Rabo
Renai Lab
ラブラボ
恋愛ラボ

description.en:
Love Lab is set in Fujisaki Girls Academy, which is known for their school body being composed of very prim and proper middle school students. The most prominent one of them is Natsuo Maki, the student council president who is admired by her classmates for her calm and polite demeanor, and her profound beauty. On the other hand, Riko Kurahashi is also admired, but due to her having a very forward and boyish personality.   
  
One day, Riko accidentally walks into Maki when she is kissing a body pillow with a picture of a guy for practice, and learns that she is not as collected as everyone thinks she is. Riko is forced into keeping Maki's secret and joins her in practicing romance activities such as holding hands and more, and in the middle of all that mess, somehow smoothly running a student council regardless!

Growing up, Eun Hae-il is unable to forget the boy he had his very first crush on.
This year, he gets accepted into his dream college after retaking the entry test 4 times.
However, one day he saves a child from drowning in the ocean but, attempting to save him, he submits to exhaustion and drowns.
Right before he stops breathing, he closes his eyes and thinks of the boy he has longed had a crush on, but when then he opens his eyes again he's no longer drowning in the ocean, but on a bus.
Hae-il, a man who has crossed between time and has survived death, now stands in front of the man he has longed loved, Yoon Pado. “Has God really given me a second chance?”
description.fr:
"Eun Hae-il", est devenu adulte sans jamais oublier le garçon dont il était secrètement amoureux. Cette année-là, après avoir passé quatre fois le concours, il a finalement été accepté dans l'école de ses rêves. Mais alors qu'il sauvait un enfant tombé à la mer, il s'est épuisé et a été emporté par les vagues, au point de se noyer lui-même.

Alors qu'il fermait les yeux en pensant au garçon qu'il aimait tant juste avant de rendre son dernier souffle, lorsqu'il les rouvrit, il se trouvait dans un bus plutôt que dans l'océan.

Ressuscité après avoir traversé la mort et le temps, Eun Hae-il se retrouve face à son amour de jeunesse, "Yoon Pado".

Est-ce que c'est vraiment une seconde chance offerte par le destin ?

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiōng Tái Kànjiàn Wǒ Dìle Ma

altTitles.ja: 君、弟を見なかったか?

description.en: The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?

title.en: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?

altTitles.id: Aku, Seorang Raja Iblis, Mengambil Budak Elf Sebagai Istriku, Tapi Bagaimana Cara Aku Mencintainya?

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?

altTitles.pt: Eu, um Lorde Demônio, comprei uma elfa escrava como minha esposa, mas como eu amo ela?

altTitles.en: I, the Demon Lord, Took a Slave Elf as My Wife, but How Do I Love Her?

altTitles.fr: Je, un seigneur des démons, ai épousé un elfe esclavagisant, mais comment l'aime-je?

altTitles.ru: Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку в жёны. И как прикажете её любить?
Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку-рабыню в жёны. И как же мне её любить?

altTitles.zh: 我这魔王娶了一个奴隶精灵当老婆，该怎么疼爱才好？

altTitles.zh-hk: 身為魔王的我娶了奴隸精靈為妻、該如何表白我的愛？

altTitles.ja: 魔王の俺が奴隷エルフを嫁にしたんだが、どう愛でればいい？

altTitles.ko: 마왕인 내가 노예 엘프를 신부로 삼았는데 어떻게 사랑하면 되지?

altTitles.pt-br: O Dilema de um Arquidemônio: Como Amar sua Noiva Elfa

altTitles.es: Soy un Rey Demonio y he Tomado Como Esposa a una Elfa Esclava, ¿Cómo Puedo Amarla?

altTitles.es-la: Soy un Rey Demonio y he Tomado Como Esposa a una Elfa Esclava, ¿Cómo Puedo Amarla?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.es: Zagan es temido como un mago malvado, es torpe y tiene una lengua afilada, y una vez más tuvo que acabar con unos ladrones que invadieron su territorio cuando estaba investigando esa mañana. En una oscura subasta, encuentra a una esclava elfa blanca, Nephie, que posee una belleza sin igual. Enamorado de ella a primera vista, utiliza su fortuna para comprarla, pero tan pobre como es socialmente, no entiende cómo relacionarse con ella. Así comienza la torpe convivencia del mago que no sabe transmitir su amor y la esclava que suspira por su amo pero no sabe cómo planteárselo.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

altTitles.ja: このままモブじゃ終われない！

altTitles.en: I Don't Wanna End Up as an NPC!

description.en:
To achieve her dream of becoming a manga artist, the succubus Satou Piko (26) moved to the human world.
Despite being an elite among succubi, possessing the pinnacle of sex appeal (self-described), she has no skill when it comes to manga!
But just when she was about to abandon her dreams and go back home to the demon world, she got a message from her old classmate, Komona...

Even at rock bottom, you can still dream big!
A slice-of-life comedy about succubi manga artists!

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

description.en:
Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games.

Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them.

As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...!

But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected....
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...
description.pt-br: Os valentões locais atormentaram Kotaro quando ele era jovem. Eles eram o lutador habilidoso Akari. Kanae, um prodígio do basquete, e Shigure, um prodígio dos videogames. Todos os dias, Kotaro competia contra esses três caras em seus respectivos esportes com a intenção de vencer. Infelizmente, ele não era páreo para eles. No último ano do ensino médio, Kotaro agora tem outra oportunidade de enfrentá-los e exigir sua retribuição…! Mas ele descobrirá um segredo que nunca teria esperado…

title.en: The Worst Princes' Battle Over Giving up the Imperial Throne

altTitles.ja-ro: Saitei Ōji-tachi Niyoru Kōi Sō “Yuzuru” Sen
Saitei Ouji-tachi Niyoru Koui Sou “Yuzuru” Sen

altTitles.en: The Battle for (Avoiding) the Throne Amongst the Lousy Princes ~Give the Wretched Throne to Someone~

altTitles.zh: 废材王子们的皇位争「让」战

altTitles.ja: 最低皇子たちによる皇位争『譲』戦
最低皇子たちによる皇位争『譲』戦 ～貧乏くじの皇位なんて誰にでもくれてやる ～

description.en:
Imperial throne? You all can have it! A comedy of who can avoid responsibility the best!  
One day, the fourth prince, Sugan was nominated by the emperor as the next in line, however . . . No way in hell, I’m running away!  
The person in question was reluctant to take over the position, and so are his siblings!? The battle to avoid the throne starts now!

altTitles.ja: カタブツ系女子に告白してみた

altTitles.en: I Tried Confessing My Love to a Serious Girl

description.en: Although she's pretty, she's widely rumoured to be the school's number one straight-laced girl. So when I gathered up my courage to confess to her…‽
description.ja: 美人だけど学校一『カタブツ』だと噂の女子に勇気を出して告白すると…!?

altTitles.ja: 満州アヘンスクワッド

description.en: Circa 1937. A Japanese soldier in Manchuria starts meddling in the opium trade but finds he may have bitten more than he can chew...
description.ja: 時は昭和12年。関東軍の兵士として満州にやってきた日方勇は、戦地で右目の視力を失ってしまう。「使えない兵隊」として軍の食糧を作る農業義勇軍に回され、上官に虐げられる日々を送るも、ある日農場の片隅でアヘンの原料であるケシが栽培されていることに気づく。病気の母を救うためアヘンの密造に手を染める勇だったが、その決断が自身の、そして満州の運命を狂わせていく…。

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

description.en:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!

This is an unusual romantic comedy for those of you who have things you can't tell others!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

title.en: Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Kiyoubinbou ~Party Jijou de Fuyojitsushi wo Yatteita Kenshi, Bannou e to Itaru~

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティを追い出された器用貧乏　～パーティ事情で付与術士をやっていた剣士、万能へと至る～

altTitles.en: The Jack-Of-All-Trades Kicked Out of the Hero’s Party: The Swordsman Who Became a Support Mage Due to Party Circumstances, Becomes All-Powerful

altTitles.zh-hk: 泛而不精的我被逐出了勇者隊伍

description.en: Being a "Jack-of-all-trades" is a sin!? Despite trying his hardest, he's been told that he's out of a job!! A member of the Hero's party, Orun, is suddenly told by the party leader; "You're insufficient, you need to leave." Additionally, Orun is mocked by his former comrades as a "Jack of All Trades, Master of None". True, he is well-rounded with no particular skill standing out. Still, he would complete every task with a skillful hand, what's more, he always performed at peak performance...! Orun, having grown frustrated, began working solo. However, deep within his heart lay the drive to become the ultimate "Jack of All Trades, Master of None", an "All-Rounder"!
description.ja:
「器用貧乏」は罪なのか！？
ソツなくガンバってきたのに戦力外通告！！

勇者パーティに所属しているオルンは、ある日突然
パーティリーダーから告げられる。

「実力不足だからパーティを抜けろ」

と。

さらに、他の仲間からは「器用貧乏」と罵られるオルン。
確かに、全てが平均的で突出した能力はない。
だが、ソツなく器用にこなしていたし、何より皆には
一番尽くしていたはずなのに…！？

失意のオルンは、ソロでの活動を開始する。
しかしその胸には、究極の「器用貧乏」ーー “万能者”になる野心が秘められていた。

title.en: I, The Invincible Villain Master With My Apprentices

altTitles.zh: 反派师尊的我带着徒弟们天下无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Shī Zūn De Wǒ Dàizhe Túdìmen Tiānxià Wúdí
Fanpai Shi Zun De Wo Daizhe Tudimen Tianxia Wudi

altTitles.en: My Villainous Master Brings Along the Peerless Apprentices

altTitles.tr: Ben, Çıraklarımla Birlikte Yenilmez Kötü Ustayım

altTitles.sv: Jag, den oövervinnelige elaka Mästaren och mina lärlingar

description.en: Shen Shi was very disappointed when he transmigrated into the book he wrote and didn't even end up as the protagonist. He also didn’t understand why the invincible hero became a girl? Even worse, why did all his apprentices want to become his wife instead! The protagonist asked him, “Master! Would you like to take me right now? Or do I have to kill off the other apprentices first before you'll have me?”
description.tr: Shen Shi çok üzgündü. Neden yazdığı kitaba gittiğini ve ana karakter olmadığını anlamadı. Ölümsüz erkek ana karakter neden kadındı? Daha bir çok şeyi anlamadı. Çırak yetişimcisi olmak istediği belliydi, bu yüzden herkes onun çırağı olmak istedi. Ana karakter: “Usta! Bugün önce beni mi yiyeceksin, yoksa bütün büyük kız kardeşleri öldürdükten sonra mı beni yemek istiyorsun?”
description.zh: 沈适感觉很难过。 他就不明白了，为什么穿越到了自己写的书里，还不是主角。 他也不明白，龙傲天男主角，为什么变成了女的？ 他更不明白，明明要养成的是徒弟，为什么一个个的都想上位当师娘？ 主角：“师父！你今天是要先吃我呢，还是我干掉所有师姐，你再吃我呢？”

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury - Vanadis Heart

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム 水星の魔 ヴァナディースハート

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Suisei no Majo - Vanadis Heart

description.en: Five years have passed since the "Vanadies Incident" that denied all Gundams. The mobile suit, nicknamed "The Curse," runs across the earth. The first official side story manga of "The Witch of Mercury'' featuring Chika Tojo from "Tanjo Senki''!
description.ja: すべてのガンダムを否定した「ヴァナディース事変」から５年後――。“呪い”と称されたそのモビルスーツは、地球の大地を駆け巡る。『幼女戦記』の東條チカを迎えて贈る、『水星の魔女』初の公式外伝漫画！
